message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1300000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but no more. I think this is a fair compromise.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go slightly above my previous offer and give you a deal for $1280000. This is the highest I can go, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise further, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1260000. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to reach a compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from my previous offer and give you a deal for $1290000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1270000. This is my final offer. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to reach a compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from my previous offer and give you a deal for $1285000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
I'm not willing to go above $1250000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider buying from John.
